com.fwdekker.randomness.array

Class ArraySettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fwdekker.randomness.Settings
      • com.fwdekker.randomness.array.ArraySettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.intellij.openapi.components.ApplicationComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.BaseComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.NamedComponent, com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<ArraySettings>

    public final class ArraySettings
extends Settings
implements com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<ArraySettings>
    Contains settings for generating random arrays of other types of random values.
